Reviews.Content: Budget accomodation in central location We stayed 2 nights at the Flamboyan. The location is in a small street a few hundred meters from the Discovery Shopping Mall and the beach just behind the mall. The room was simple but clean with working A/C and a fan. The sheets and towels did show some stains however. Also the bathroom fittings were quite worn out. A complimentary breakfast is served in the porch in front of each individual room with a choice of toast and jam or indonesian fried rice. Airport transportation is also provided and is only 10 minutes away. For the price of around $30 a night I was not expecting much, so I was pleasantly surprised by the beautiful gardens and even small swimming pool along with the individual patios for each room. A bit of renovation would definitely improve the place, but with an increase in price also I suspect. The staff, as I experienced throughout Bali, was polite and helpful.
Reviews.Author: kane_paris
